sumeetjain.com

This website: Journal, technical writing, photos, and portfolio - all by yours truly

My website for several years. What do you think?

sumeetjain.com is built using the Jekyll blog engine. I've built my own theme from scratch using Liquid. The website uses jQuery - mostly via a plugin I wrote to handle footnotes in my journal entries.
